ICBM81.description: Mori S, Oishi K, Jiang H, Jiang L, Li X, Akhter K, Hua K, Faria AV, Mahmood A, Woods R, Toga AW, Pike GB, Neto PR, Evans A, Zhang J, Huang H, Miller MI, van Zijl P, Mazziotta J. PMID: 18255316; PMCID: PMC2478641.

description: This gear takes the isotropic hyperfine reconstructions that have been bias corrected (N4) and calculates volume estimates for white matter, grey matter & CSF by calculating Jacobian determinants. ROI outputs can be selected from a number of atlases in the configuration.

input.description: input file (usually bias corrected isotropic reconstruction)

label: Hyperfine: ANTS VBM
name: hyperfine-vbm
